sentences.en: A drug trafficker was arrested by the police yesterday.
sentences.cn: 一名贩毒分子昨日被警方捕获.

sentences.en: A fugitive drug trafficker was captured after two decades on the run.
sentences.cn: 一名逃亡的毒贩在逃亡二十年后被捉拿归案了.

sentences.en: A violent drug trafficker in Colombia is behind bars in a luxurious prison in his hometown.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚一名暴戾的运毒犯关在他家乡的一所豪华监狱里.

sentences.en: Born as an orphan, subject grew up to become an illegal drug trafficker and narcotics addict.
sentences.cn: 身为孤儿, 个体在长大后成为毒贩,本身也染上毒瘾.

sentences.en: Jamaican police arrested Christopher Coke, an alleged drug - trafficker and gang leader.
sentences.cn: 牙买加警方已经逮捕毒品贩及帮会头目克里斯多夫?科克.

sentences.en: Mike: Did you hear about Hello Kitty being a drug trafficker?
sentences.cn: 麦可: 你听说有人用凯蒂猫来从事毒品交易 吗 ?

sentences.en: Police said they believed the attack was in retaliation for the death of the drug trafficker.
sentences.cn: 警察说他们认为这次袭击是针对那个毒犯的死实施的报复。

sentences.en: The drug trafficker is about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.cn: 毒品贩子担心传统乐曲会的状况.

sentences.en: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.cn: 毒品贩子担心传统音乐会的状况.

sentences.en: The tormenting tough issue made the drug trafficker with tragic trait of character toss and turn.
sentences.cn: 这个令人痛苦的棘手问题使那个有悲剧性性格特点的毒贩辗转反侧.

sentences.en: They have been arrested as suspected drug traffickers.
sentences.cn: 他们因涉嫌贩毒而被捕。
